title: Project: Yasuo rework?
body: All the other Project skins are awesome except for {{champion:157}}  :(

replies.body: You mean Splash art or in-game?

Well, he has effects for his abilities. I just find the windwall very unsatisfying compared to Classic Yasuo, with all the wind movement effects, and such. But Riot will never tweak or change any Project skins to the magnitude of Zed.....ooooohhhhhhhh too gud.
